name: Old Fashioned
directions: Muddle together 1/2 teaspoon sugar and 3 dashes bitters in rocks glass. Place a large ice cube in glass then add 2 oz Bourbon. Stir gently and garnish with lemon peel or cherry.

name: Vodka Martini
directions: Add ice to cocktail shaker followed by 2 1/2 oz of fine Vodka and 1/2 oz of Dry Vermouth. Shake well until chilled then strain into a martini glass and garnish with olive or lemon peel.

name: Jungle Bird
directions: Combine 1 1/2 oz Rum, 3/4 oz Campari, 1/2 oz fresh lime juice, 1/2 oz simple syrup, and 1 1/2 oz pineapple juice into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake, pour into a glass with fresh ice.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
directions: Add 3/4 oz of each liquor, 3/4 oz lemon juice, and 3/4 oz simple syrup to a Collins glass filled with ice, then top with cola and stir gently.

name: Gin-Gin Mule
directions: To a cocktail shaker, add 8 mint leaves, 1 oz simple syrup and 3/4 oz fresh squeezed lime juice and muddle together. Then add 1 1/2 oz gin and fill the shaker with ice, shake well. Strain into highball glass filled with fresh ice. Top with 4-5 oz ginger beer.

name: White Lady
directions: Add 2 oz gin, 1/2 oz triple sec, 1 egg white, and 1/2 oz lemon juice to an empty cocktail shaker without ice and dry shake to emulsify. Add ice and shake again until cold, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: El Diablo
directions: Add 1 1/2 oz tequila, 1/2 oz creme de cassis, 1/2 oz fresh squeezed lime juice and ice into a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into Collins glass over fresh ice and top with 3 oz ginger beer.

name: Cosmopolitan
directions: To a cocktail shaker combine 1 1/2 oz vodka, 1/2 oz cranberry juice, 3/4 oz lime juice, and 3/4 oz cointreau with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into chilled cocktail glass.
